useCase.name: Search Products

preconditions.precondition: The Consumer navigates to the search function

useCase.trigger: The Consumer enters a search query

mainSequence.step: Actor Consumer enters a search query
Actor Search Interface sends the search request to Platform Backend
Actor Platform Backend retrieves query data packages from Data Registry
Actor Data Registry returns search results to Platform Backend
Actor Platform Backend displays search results
Actor Search Interface shows search results to Consumer
